pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tabular Maximum Likelihood Classifier // The maximum likelihood classifier (MLC) is one of the most common classifiers used for remote sensing imagery. This package uses 'RcppArmadillo' to provide a fast implementation of the MLC to train and predict over tabular data (data.frame). The algorithms were based on Mather (1985) doi:10.1080/01431168508948456 method.
